title: Marketplace Roundtable #20: Exploring Paradigm Shifts With KCI Research
description: William Travis Koldus has a twenty plus year career as an investment analyst, investor, portfolio manager, consultant, and writer. Travis believes we are near a meaningful inflection point, perhaps the biggest one yet, for the third time in the past 15 years. You can gain access to Travis's insights via his SA Marketplace service, The Contrarian.
itunes:title: Exploring paradigm shifts with KCI Research
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: When is the next paradigm shift? KCI Research makes the case that the commodity sector could be the beneficiary.
